 Stop abiding by your heaten religion. There is still time! The Energy Element can still save you. He is the Truth. He is the ultimate supreme. He is a he...i'm sure of it.
 
 I have time-honored scripture to back my relgion. I abide by the most ancient book - "The Energy Man's Superlicious Plan." It is over 30,000 years old. The original still exists - you can see it engraved on the bottom of the pacific ocean sea floor. Some claim the engravings are just random lines. But they are wrong. Why? Look at the amazing commandments the Energy Element has given us:
 
 1) Thou shalt do the right thing.

 7) Cherish your family as you would you vineyard
 
 Abide to the laws and you as yet may be saved!
